thread.title: Investor’s guide: Strategy for young investors
thread.title_full: Investor’s guide: Strategy for young investors

title: Investor’s guide: Strategy for young investors
text: Investor’s guide: Strategy for young investors 19 Jul 2015, 7:21PM IST Copy URL Embed Dhirendra Kumar, CEO of the Value Research says that young investors must plan their savings and start a recurring deposit. Adding further on he says that the young investors must avoid investing in PPF if you have EPF. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 108 views
